quotes.message: If I cannot do great things, I can do small things in a great way.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.message: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
quotes.author: William James, American philosopher and psychologist

quotes.message: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Ghandi

quotes.message: Don't sit down and wait for the opportunities to come. Get up and make them.
quotes.author: Madam C.J. Walker, American entrepreneur and activist

quotes.message: Opportunity is missed by most people because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.message: The most difficult thing is the decision to act; the rest is merely tenacity.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.message: The bad news is time flies. The good news is you're the pilot.
quotes.author: Michael Altshuler, American author and motivational speaker

quotes.message: I can't change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.
quotes.author: Jimmy Dean

quotes.message: It is often the small steps, not the giant leaps, that bring about the most lasting change.
quotes.author: Queen Elizabeth II

quotes.message: In the long run, you make your own luck good, bad, or indifferent.
quotes.author: Loretta Lynn

quotes.message: If my mind can conceive it, if my heart can believe it, then i can achieve it
quotes.author: Muhammad ali

quotes.message: If my mind can conceive it, if my heart can believe it, then I can achieve it.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

prefixes.prompt: Low on motivation, well here is a quote that should get you going.
Here is a good way to start the day, with a motivational quote!
Need a boost? here is a motivational quote.
